about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Transforming the future of collaborative education, one connection at a time

image.overlayText: At ThinkUp, we believe that the education of the future is collaborative, inclusive, and powered by technology.

about.title: Who We Are?
paragraphs: We are ThinkUp, a startup founded by students passionate about educational innovation and technology, committed to transforming the way young people learn and collaborate.

We believe that knowledge grows when shared, which is why we developed SkillShare, a social networking application focused on connecting students with similar academic interests to form dynamic and effective study groups.

mission.title: Our Mission
paragraphs: Promote collaborative learning through technology by providing students with a platform that connects people with the same academic goals, encourages cooperation, and facilitates access to shared study resources to improve academic performance.

vision.title: Our Vision
paragraphs: Become the leading educational social network in Latin America and around the world, where millions of students find in SkillShare a safe, dynamic and reliable space to learn together, enhance their capabilities and build solid academic communities that transcend the classroom.

items.name: Collaboration
items.description: We believe that knowledge multiplies when shared, and we work to strengthen cooperation among students.

items.name: Innovation
items.description: We are committed to using technology to transform the way people learn and connect academically.

items.name: Accessibility

items.name: Commitment to Education
